author: KermitAI
install_msg: Thanks for installing the TTS cog! Use `[p]tts` to have the bot speak text in your voice channel, and `[p]ttsset` to configure settings.
name: TTS
description: A cog that allows users to have text spoken in voice channels using Google's Text-to-Speech (gTTS) library.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data about users.
